name: Galaxy Space Crossing
description:
Galaxy Space Crossing is a science fiction racing game that require fast reactions to drive a fantastic spaceship in an entire galaxy full of obstacles.
In this game you have three minutes and five lives to earn as many points as you can, by collecting energies in your way and avoiding collision with asteroids . The more energies you collect the more points you gain.
As a space racer you will be faced with a large number of obstacles and incalculable energies; Red energy make spaceship faster and blue energy slow down the speed.
Touch the right half of the screen to turn on the right, and the left half to turn on the left!
Start your spaceship engine and have a great driving experience with special effects and high score system to track your records!

Music provided by freesoundtrackmusic.com.
